page.title: 20A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: Wake 6.30,read book,play with brother Andrew.Breakfast,cereal,toast and honey.Mawgan School 8.55,Mr Ellis registers,assembly.Lessons,reading book,sit next to Sarah Millatt and Morwenna Peters.Disgusting maths,then play time on the bars.More maths to lunch time.Lunch,marmalade roll,Kit- Kat,cherries,apple.Chase boys,to playing field to make tree house. Line up for afternoon school,make table mat.After school as its Friday allowed a lolly,went to tree house with Matthew and Daniel Farmer,and Andrew.Went to Philippa's for tea, played in attic,had pizza,lettuce, tomato,cucumber and lemonade.After tea went to Mawgan Porth with Philippa and her daddy.On beach dug holes,made boat and sea wall.Home at 8.25,had book went to bed.Tomorrow ballet and Porthpean beach with Sarah & Morwenna.
